data.message: Stop polluting the seas with your plastic. Sort out a recycling option with a refundable deposit.

replies.message: Hi Pat, at this stage, our focus is on recovering all of our packaging so none of it ends up as litter or in the oceans. We’ve worked with a number of experts and organisations to understand where we should focus our efforts. Plastic has lots of benefits and is fully recyclable. It’s much lighter and uses less material than glass. It also can’t get broken easily so it’s safer. As long as it’s responsibly disposed of, it can be recycled and reused into other packaging or fibre. Moreover, we’re committed to supporting any well-designed initiative that could improve recovering and recycling rates, including a deposit return scheme. Ultimately that decision must be led by Government but requiring many organisations, – public and private – to work in partnership.
